data.SOURCE:
@EndUserText.label: 'Interface View - Weight Ticket Header'
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@Metadata.allowExtensions: true
define root view entity ZPR_I_HEADER
  as select from zpr_tb_wt_hd as Header
  composition [0..*] of ZPR_I_ITEM        as _Item
  association [0..*] to ZPR_I_LOG         as _Log     on  $projection.Werks  = _Log.Werks
                                                      and $projection.Wtktno = _Log.wtktno
  association [0..*] to ZPR_LOG_view      as _logui   on  $projection.Werks  = _logui.Werks
                                                      and $projection.Wtktno = _logui.Wtktno
  association [0..1] to I_Plant           as _Plant   on  $projection.Werks = _Plant.Plant
  association [0..1] to ZPR_I_SUPPLIER    as _Vendor  on  $projection.Lifnr = _Vendor.Lifnr
                                                      and $projection.Werks = _Vendor.Werks
  association [0..1] to ZPR_I_RESULTS     as _Results on  $projection.Wtktno = _Results.wtktno
  association [0..1] to ZPR_SH_DRIVEPER   as _Driver  on  $projection.Driverperf = _Driver.driverperf

  association [0..1] to ZPR_SH_TRUCK_COND as _Truck   on  $projection.Truckcond = _Truck.truckcond
  association [0..1] to ZPR_I_UOM         as _Measure on  $projection.WeightUnit = _Measure.Measure
                                                      and _Measure.Language      = $session.system_language
  association [0..1] to ZPR_SH_WTKT as _WttktHelp on $projection.Wtktno = _WttktHelp.Wtktno

{
  key Header.werks                 as Werks,
  key Header.wtktno                as Wtktno,
      Header.movenum               as Movenum,
      Header.stop                  as Stop,
      case  Header.status
       when '10' then 'Created'
       when '20' then 'Hauler PO created'
       else 'Created'
       end                         as Status,
      Header.originreg             as Originreg,
      Header.origincoun            as Origincoun,
      Header.truckno               as Truckno,
      Header.driverperf            as Driverperf,
      Header.truckcond             as Truckcond,
      Header.dis_travelled         as DisTravelled,
      Header.dis_travelled_uom     as Distravelleduom,
      Header.bldat                 as Bldat,
      Header.ersda                 as Ersda,
      Header.cputm                 as Cputm,
      Header.ernam                 as Ernam,
      Header.laeda                 as Laeda,
      Header.aenam                 as Aenam,
      Header.curcy                 as Curcy,
      Header.lifnr                 as Lifnr,
      Header.po_price              as PoPrice,
      Header.receipt_date          as ReceiptDate,
      Header.receipt_time          as ReceiptTime,
      Header.log_handle            as LogHandle,
      Header.bukrs                 as Bukrs,
      Header.invoice_spl1          as InvoiceSpl1,
      Header.invoice_spl2          as InvoiceSpl2,
      Header.invoice_spl3          as InvoiceSpl3,
      Header.qualifier             as Qualifier,
      Header.hauler                as Hauler,
      Header.supplier              as Supplier,
      Header.driver                as Driver,
      Header.trk_loadwg            as TrkLoadwg,
      Header.trk_unloadwg          as TrkUnloadwg,
      Header.live_wg               as LiveWg,
      Header.weight_unit           as WeightUnit,
      Header.pln_date              as PlnDate,
      Header.pln_time              as PlnTime,
      Header.act_date              as ActDate,
      Header.act_time              as ActTime,
      Header.grosswt_date          as GrosswtDate,
      Header.grosswt_time          as GrosswtTime,
      Header.grosswt_user          as GrosswtUser,
      Header.tarewt_date           as TarewtDate,
      Header.tarewt_time           as TarewtTime,
      Header.tarewt_user           as TarewtUser,
      Header.netwt_date            as NetwtDate,
      Header.netwt_time            as NetwtTime,
      Header.netwt_user            as NetwtUser,
      Header.dooropen_date         as DooropenDate,
      Header.dooropen_time         as DooropenTime,
      Header.doorclose_date        as DoorcloseDate,
      Header.doorclose_time        as DoorcloseTime,
      Header.truck_entry_date      as TruckEntryDate,
      Header.truck_entry_time      as TruckEntryTime,
      Header.arrival_loc           as ArrivalLoc,
      Header.team_memb             as TeamMemb,
      Header.vend_lot_id_no        as VendLotIdNo,
      Header.dock                  as Dock,
      Header.deletion              as Deletion,
      Header.price_updated         as PriceUpdated,
      Header.mat_weight            as MatWeight,
      Header.mat_distance          as MatDistance,
      Header.hauler_po             as HaulerPO,
      Header.hauler_po_item        as HaulerPOItem,
      Header.comments              as Comments,
      @Semantics.user.lastChangedBy: true
      Header.last_changed_by       as LastChangedBy,
      @Semantics.systemDateTime.localInstanceLastChangedAt: true
      Header.last_changed_at       as LastChangedAt,
      Header.local_last_changed_at as LocalLastChangedAt,
      _Driver.text                 as Driverperft,
      _Truck.text                  as Truckcondt,
      _Plant.PlantName             as Plantname,
      _Measure.MeasureName         as MName,
      _Item,
      _Log,
      _logui,
      _Plant,
      _Vendor,
      _Results,
      _Driver,
      _Truck,
      _Measure,
      _WttktHelp
}
where
  deletion = ''
/*+[internal] {

],

],

}
